text: The company staff, Ms Kausellya was very helpful and patient. We are new customer and did not know we had to make an appointment for any repair. She kindly help my dad to fix his hearing aid. Overall, a wonderful experience with the company.

Good service by Audiologist Kausellya. She recommended me Phonak hearing aids very helpful in my daily lif3 communication and enjoy bluetooth phone calls via the hearing aids. Phonak hearinv aids are really good. The audiologist also very professional.

I am glad to have gone to Novena branch to address my hearing aid issue.
Miss Esther, your personnel on duty is an epitome of customer service. She was patient and explained what could have been the problem explicitly. Kudos to her.
At the same time, I would like to add that a Miss Kuali (hope l have got her name correctly) from your hot line was indeed very helpful too.
It speaks a heap of the excellent service from your company.
Thanks, Tony Wu
Miss Kausellya Subramaniam took the time to listen and explain complex concepts in a clear and concise manner and help my dad with very fine-tune of his hearing aid.

I recently visited this hearing aid center and had the pleasure of meeting their audiologist, Yee Ven and the staff, Esther. From the moment I walked in the door, I was impressed with the welcoming and professional atmosphere of the center. The staff was friendly and attentive, and the waiting area was clean and comfortable.

During my appointment, the audiologist took the time to listen to my concerns and answer all of my questions. They were extremely knowledgeable and provided me with helpful information about my hearing loss and the different types of hearing aids available. They made sure I understood all of my options and helped me choose the best hearing aid for my needs and budget.

The fitting process was seamless, and the audiologist took the time to adjust my hearing aids to ensure they were comfortable and providing me with the best possible sound quality. They also provided me with tips on how to properly care for and maintain my new hearing aids.

Overall, I highly recommend this hearing aid center and their audiologist. They truly care about their patients and go above and beyond to ensure their hearing needs are met. If you're in need of a hearing aid, look no further than this center - you won't be disappointed!
